message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.CL, cs.CYBER, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
- cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) is the most likely category as the paper investigates the development of perception of the refugee situation on Twitter, which is a social network. 
- cs.SOC (Social and Behavioral Sciences) is also likely as the paper analyzes the reactions of people on social media towards the refugee situation. 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is another possible category as the paper may involve natural language processing techniques to analyze the tweets. 
- cs.CYBER (Cybersecurity and Privacy) is a less likely category, but it is possible that the paper discusses the security and privacy implications of the refugee situation on social media. 
- cs.MM (Multimedia) is also a less likely category, but it is possible that the paper analyzes the use of multimedia (e.g. images, videos) in the tweets related to the refugee situation.
